Contributor: Tchernoff, Sampson, artist.; Royal Institute Galleries, publisher.; David Allen & Sons, printer.;
Note: Illustration is by Sampson Tchernoff. Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells of an exhibition of Serbian war pictures by the artist Sampson Tchernoff. The illustration is of a boy of fourteen in an arm cast. The illustration is called "Serbia's Defender, bombthrower of fourteen."
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: Fund raising -- Great Britain.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters -- Great Britain.; Great Britain -- Foreign relations -- Serbia.;

Title: Serbia's defender
